snippet.title: Environmental Station Alpha Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Environmental Station Alpha is now out on Windows and Mac for $8, with a 10% discount for the first week!
Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/350070
Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/environmentalstation_alpha_storefront
Game site: http://www.hempuli.com/esa/

Environmental Station Alpha is an action adventure platformer with a retro aesthetic and heavy emphasis on exploration. In the game the player controls a robot sent to investigate a mysterious, abandoned space station with the mission to find out what exactly took place there.

Previous trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B9WILZgDAVQ
Presskit: http://www.hempuli.com/press/sheet.php?p=Environmental_Station_Alpha

Game by Arvi 'Hempuli' Teikari (http://www.hempuli.com)
Music by Roope 'Noby' Mäkinen (http://noby.untergrund.net/)
Sound effects by Joonas 'Kissa3' Turner (https://twitter.com/KissaKolme) & Niilo Takalainen

This game was created using Multimedia Fusion 2 by Clickteam.
